data.question: Which of the GVV pillars focuses on questions such as “Are ethics or values conflicts just a regular part of everyday living?”

response.content:
That is incorrect. The Choice pillar is at the heart of GVV and asks “Do we believe we have an option to speak up?”

The correct answer is Normalization.
That is correct. The Normalization pillar seeks to answer the question “Are ethics or values conflicts just a regular part of everyday living?”
